Reviews.Content: stayed holiday dirtiest hotel weve stayed filthy stained reception carpet alerted clean urine toilet minibar hairs bedding covered dubious stains replacement wasnt cleaner avaialble definately recommended

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointing”
Reviews.Author: norabaiou
Reviews.Content: hotel staff unhelpful especially manager reception uncooperative care guests nice person luggage handler carry suitcases tiny lift carried own suitcases struggling coach load bags suitcases wifi charged 5 euro hour 30 minutes manager answered hotel wasnt offering option found attitude upsetting especially heart europe prices charged breakfast mediocre quality lady kept watching clients helping themselves food taking piece bread bun eat kept staring clients food tables obsessively attitude extremely annoying care satisfaction quantity poor quality food eaten personally recommend avoid hotel managment understands guests treated nicely changes attitude

Reviews.Title: “would not recommend”
Reviews.Author: marianna1977
Reviews.Content: hotel expected europe hotel nice removed attractions rome breakfast ok eggs real eggs service ok elevator shower

Reviews.Title: “Off the beaten track”
Reviews.Author: PrincePolo
Reviews.Content: hotel completely beaten track public transport connections buses central train station taxi tofrom airport fiumicino takes hour traffic meeting nearby location perfect clean adequately decorated hotel class front desk bought voucher 1 hour wifi access tried connect connection speed slow download emails complained refund hassle breakfast bit strange experience – walked crowded breakfast coffee rolls butter jelly offer somewhat disappointed soon discovered breakfast adjacent frosted glass door decent breakfast offer individual guests moved server verified individual guest able enjoy nice continental breakfast
